thread.title: RHOA’s Kandi Burruss Calls Porsha Williams a “Hypocrite” and a “Liar”
thread.title_full: RHOA’s Kandi Burruss Calls Porsha Williams a “Hypocrite” and a “Liar”

author: Jessica Bennett
title: RHOA’s Kandi Burruss Calls Porsha Williams a “Hypocrite” and a “Liar”
text:
February 23, 2017 by Jessica Bennett 0 Shares Advertisement 
Kandi Burruss and Porsha Williams ’s beef came to a head on the latest episode of Real Housewives of Atlanta , as the two argued face-to-face over Kandi’s past with women , including an alleged seven year relationship. 
The Grammy winner has responded to the episode, calling her former friend a liar and a hypocrite, as well as a few other choice words. 

Over lunch, Porsha shot several accusations Kandi’s way, harping on the singer’s history with women while claiming she knows one who was involved with the mother of two for seven years. 

The former football wife also accused Kandi’s husband Todd Tucker of cheating on the singer under the alias “Marvin.” 

Kandi admitted in her personal blog for BravoTV.com that the 35-year-old got under her skin, calling her a flat-out liar. 
“I was irritated with her. She used lies to deflect the truth and anger me. Porsha is a hypocrite and a liar. Bottom line is if you're a woman that has hooked up with a girl before, don't go around throwing "shade" at someone because they've done the same thing.” 


She continued, “I'm very transparent. I'm married. I love my husband. I'm not in the closet. I don't have a sex dungeon. I've never had a seven year relationship with a woman. Porsha still hasn't sent me the name or number of whoever this anonymous woman is.” 

The highest-paid housewife also doesn’t believe rumors of her husband’s infidelity. 

“My husband doesn't tell people his name is "Marvin" to cheat. People recognize him on the streets before they do me, so who would believe him if he had?” 
Kandi continued to point out Porsha’s hypocritical ways, saying the divorceé admitted to kissing her but “blamed it on the Henny.” 
Who do you believe, Porsha or Kandi? Sound off below! Credit: Instagram 
The Real Housewives of Atlanta Season 9 airs Sundays at 8 p.m. ET on Bravo.
